name: lambda-base
description: Base folder structure for Lambda projects

scripts.test: npm run lint-and-fix && mocha --require ts-node/register test/**/*.ts
scripts.local-build: npm run package && cd dist && npm i --only=prod
scripts.deploy-stack: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name serverless-file-processing --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2 --parameter-overrides EnableSQS=true ApiVersion=200929-1930
scripts.disable-stack: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name serverless-file-processing --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2 --parameter-overrides EnableSQS=false ApiVersion=200929-1930
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-lambda && npm run deploy-api

author: Andy Blackledge
